text: Tando () is a village (selo) in Botlikhsky District of the Republic of Dagestan, Russia. The village was seized by a Chechen guerrilla unit led by Shamil Basayev in August 1999 in the course of the Invasion of Dagestan.Globalsecurity.org, DAGESTAN WRAP ==References== * Царь-бомба для электората by Виктор Мясников, Независимая газета (Nezavisimaya Gazeta), 2007-09-14, * Report to the United Nations Human Rights Committee for its consideration of the Fifth Periodic Report by the Russian Federation Category:Rural localities in Dagestan
title: Tando
